title: [Grawood Farmstead, Meadow]
description: Leading to a field with plowed rows of dark soil topped by low-growing plants of deep green, the path opens up, and the fences splay in opposite directions to enclose the space.  Looking out over the land, an odd form rises here and there, the silhouettes of booths and stalls.
room.location: Grawood Farmstead outside of River's Rest
